dcterms:creator: Amir Zadeh
Rowan Zellers
Eli Pincus
Louis-Philippe Morency
dcterms:description: CMU-MOSI is a dataset of multimodal language specifically focused on multimodal sentiment analysis. It contains 2199 video segments taken from 93 Youtube movie review videos, with real-valued high-agreement sentiment intensity annotations in the range [-3, +3].
dcterms:title: CMU-MOSI

dcterms:creator: AmirAli Bagher Zadeh
Paul Pu Liang
Soujanya Poria
Erik Cambria
Louis-Philippe Morency
dcterms:description: CMU-MOSEI is a dataset for multimodal language analysis in the wild, focusing on sentiment analysis with sentence-level sentiment annotations. It provides a rich set of multimodal data for various NLP tasks.
dcterms:title: CMU-MOSEI
